page.title: 14LOWER MODDERSHALL & MILLS 2
page.content: One house is a tennant farm, which concentrates mainly upon a dairy herd. Another was until recently also a tennant farm, but the house has been modernised and most of the land kept by Staffordshire County Council. The two remaining houses were originally mill cottages, but both are now modernised and enlarged as private dwellings. In one the two inhabitants pursue their home industries, the one being Ochre Mill Home Crafts and the other Ochre Mill Technical Services Ltd. These are cottage industries in the real sense of the word, and are run entirely by the two inhabitants of Ochre Mill. Mosty Lea Mill _ re_built with help of young people from courses at Stoke Technical College. Open to public in future. Wetmore Mill _ at Scout Camp.
